fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Conquer a player in the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Conquering a player will attempt to convert them into your minion. They will keep their role, but their new goal will be to live to see you win the game.
- If you cannot convert those you Conquer, you will kill them instead.
- You cannot convert a target if:
 - They are Conversion Immune
 - They are a NK or Evil Faction member
 - They are a TPo
 - You already have one living minion
